title: About Me
paragraph1: Passionate fullstack developer, I enjoy designing modern and useful web applications, with a focus on performance, user experience, and backend robustness. My personal projects have helped me build practical solutions in various areas: property booking, weather display, project management, and interactive portfolio.
paragraph2: My main stack includes React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I value clean code, accessibility, and optimizing performance both on the client and server sides.
paragraph3: Curious and meticulous, I keep a close eye on web development best practices: lightweight DevOps, automated testing, design systems, CI/CD, and third-party API integration.
paragraph4: I'm looking to contribute to meaningful projects within a team that values clarity, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
